page.title: 09GOODWOOD TERRENA.
page.content: { Goodwood Terrena }as this area is known today is part of the {Goodwood {Estate }of the Duke of Richmond and Gordon. It covers a total of 240 acres and offers many amenties. The airfield thrives with a flying school, flying club, aircraft maintenance, landing facilities for light aircraft, an air taxi and air ambulance company, an air charter company, an aerial photography company, a helicopter school and two banner-towing companies. Today there are about 55 aircraft permanently hangared here and 45,141 movements were recorded in 1984. The former motor circuit, which offers facilities for testing cars,is also used by motor clubs and provides a venue for other events such as motor shows & sponsored bike rides.Other areas within the site are used by a local driving school and other small businesses.
